title: F. Recipients of Personal Data
intro: We may share your information, including Customer Information, Transaction Information and Personal Information, with:
list: Our affiliated companies and businesses with whom we are under common corporate control.

Third-party service providers and their respective subcontractors, affiliates or downstream partners (including but not limited to fourth-party providers and any other associated external parties) who perform services on our behalf.
Government agencies when required by law.
A third party in connection with a merger, sale or acquisition or a bankruptcy.
footer: All of our affiliated legal entities and businesses that receive your information from us will comply with the terms of this Privacy Policy with respect to their use and disclosure of such information.
